name: MushRun
description:
MushRun is an infinite runner game.

As a wizard you walk through a forest of giant mushrooms while avoiding getting hit by rolling giant mushrooms. As the days go by, you will see the colors change. The goal is to see how far you can travel with out dying. Good Luck!

Controls
  • Low Graphics - 1
  • High Graphics - 2
  • forward - w/up
  • backward - s/down
  • left - a/left
  • right - d/right
  • jump/double jump - space
  • toggle autorun - r
